translated: The Group of Three Collections🔽The Chapter on the Interior
“For seven years we have been living
in the forest, thirty of us.
We are being killed because of the glow of the jewel;
this is what we have been discussing.
As long as we touch the jewel,
what do you think we should do?”
“This is a jewel, a cat’s eye,
It is not possible to kill its beauty;

analyzed: a pakkam atha sūkarāti 🔽maṇi sūkara jātakam pañcama
translated: you pigs should leave.”🔽The Jewel Pig Jātaka (no. 5)
